casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Michael M. Morin (12631)

Lavery, Heiman and Freedman, Js.

Argued April 29 decision released May 24, 1994 Frederick W. Odell, for the appellant (defendant). David J. Sheldon, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Patricia A. Swords, state’s attorney, and Richard Colangelo, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
